<casebody firstpage="671" lastpage="671" xmlns="http://nrs.harvard.edu/urn-3:HLS.Libr.US_Case_Law.Schema.Case_Body:v1">
 <parties id="p-1">
  In the Matters of AS.L.G. and Au.R.G.
 </parties>
 <docketnumber id="p-2">
  No. 624PA05.
 </docketnumber>
 <court id="p-3">
  Supreme Court of North Carolina.
 </court>
 <decisiondate id="p-4">
  March 29, 2006.
 </decisiondate>
 <attorneys id="p-5">
  Paul Freeman, Wilkesboro, for Wilkes County DSS.
 </attorneys>
 <attorneys id="p-6">
  Tracie M. Jordan, for Guardian ad Litem.
 </attorneys>
 <opinion id="p-7">
  The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 23rd day of March 2006 by Respondent to Consolidate for Oral Argument:
 </opinion>
 <opinion id="p-8">
  "Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 29th day of March 2006."
 </opinion>
 <opinion type="majority">
  <author id="p-9">
   Justice TIMMONS-GOODSON recused.
  </author>
 </opinion>
</casebody>
